markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Through Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1705) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll, your targets don't benefit from cover provided by living or undead creatures.
name: Through Spell
